features: Premium Quality Material of Cute Highlighter: Our highlights markers aesthetic are made of premium quality PP which is durable and long lasting. The material of these yellow highlighters bulk classroom have fine workmanship and highly water soluble. This blue highlighters aesthetic is the sweetest way to highlight your artists dreams.

Cool Design of Multi Color Highlighters: This highlighter pen brings a lot of fun and convenience when drawing wide lines, underlines and highlights. These book highlighters can also protect and highlight your handwritten text, making the next page shadow less. The simple and clear appearance make these bear aesthetic highlighters easy for you to identify the color of each pen.

Easy to Hold Pastel Highlighter Set: These highlighters assorted colors bear pens has a designer look. Our cute kids stationary are comfortable and easy to hold without a sore hand. The versatile chisel tip efficiently produces wide and narrow lines. With the bear design you can easily put these cute markers for school in your pocket and backpack.

Easy to Use Thin Highlighters: These multi highlighter will not penetrate into the paper under your mark, so you can take notes and highlight important points with confidence. The bright and high-contrast multi colored highlighters add color to highlighted text and make it more visible. With our highlighter markers you don't worry about the ink getting your hands or sleeves dirty.

Multiple Purpose Cute Pens for Kids: These highlighters cute stationary supplies can be used in arts and crafts, school coloring projects, art class and school prizes for kids. This cute pen markers for writing can be a perfect gift for teachers who use color code annotations. This mini highlighters bulk is perfect for college coursework.

productInformation.value: #43,238 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products) #328 in Liquid Highlighters

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Colors!
reviews.reviewText: The colors of these highlighters are so bright and vibrant. The colors that I was worried would be too dark (purple and blue) were the perfect amount of sheer and light so that they would not cover words. The highlighters themselves are also so very cute. The only issue I have with them is that they don’t flow very lightly and smoothly and it isn’t that satisfying to highlight using them, but the colors and packaging make up for it. Very good for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: these are so cute! i saw the midliner highliters and they were WAyYYYyy to expensive. these were reccomended and omg! they are so amazing! they have a thin and a thic side, and both are amazing for art, headings, and more!!a must-buy! ^_^

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice! 8/10 check for pictures
reviews.reviewText: Very nice I like the way they write,and the thick ness was what I expected, if you are looking for a thick highlighter this is not for you but for a thin one yes, the packaging could use some help maybe adding a cute icon on the wrapping? It would add some cuteness it leaked through the paper but not too much if you are looking for a highlighter for the aesthetic this is for you but if your looking for a dependable work highlighter maybe another option it’s honestly your choice but I would rate this a 8/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I LIVE THESE HIGHLIGHTERS SO MUCH! They are super cute! And I love how it have two where you can write and highlight and it's not expensive!!! A warning- be careful when taking off the cap of the highlighter and putting it on the back. There is this little white part that comes off and can get stuck and you can't get out so you lose the cap to one end and it drys out. Lightly put the cap on the back or dont put it on. *see the pic's above*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice pastel colors
reviews.reviewText: The colors are pastel and light. There is a quality issue on one of the highlighter that the color is already fading and streaking so I cannot use that color. I assume you can say it is defective out of the set. I will not bother to return it since I can use the rest of the pens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good quality highlighters AND so cute! I got one for my 9 yo niece who loved them. Would make nice school reward hand outs. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my office, I was getting bored of using the same standard highlighters at work, so I decided to buy these to add more personality to my desk, and I was very pleased, they're very cute and work great, I was a bit worried about the yellow highlighter being to opaque since I've never used this brand and have had bad experience with other yellow highlighters (different brands) but that was not a problem for these. The caps are also perfect, they come off easily without you having to struggle to open them (unlike the thick Sharpie highlighters)10/10 Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: very cute highlighters I just thought they'd be a bit more pastel like the outsides of the markers. They're the classic highlighter colors, but the markers are still really cute and bright, and I enjoy that there's 2 different size tips on the pens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These are adorable pens with a thicker highliter end and a thinner felt tip end and ah they are amazing.They came here quickly, were very well packaged and have a good range of colours, while still being really cute.They are such good value too; even highliters alone can cost around £7 so I would recommend them to anyone looking for some kawaii stationary :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2017
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2018
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute! I love the animal themes, and they last a good while. BE AWARE THESE ARE NOT PASTEL HIGHLIGHTERS. I was expecting them to be pastel, which is why they are 4 stars, awesome stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: didn’t like at all smell of chemicals and colours aren’t light enough to highlight with
